Item.comments: generic method called from other methods - updates 'related_id' via SQL
Item.method_code:
'Item context must be a relationship item type 'custom attribute 'newRelatedId' must be set !!! 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim relItemType As String = Me.GetType() Dim newRelatedId As String = Me.getAttribute("newRelatedId","")
If newRelatedId = "" Then Me.getInnovator().newError("Method 'Update RelShip related_id' failed ! Custom attribute 'newRelatedId' not set.")
Dim tableName As String = "[" & CCO.DB.GenerateTableName(relItemType) & "]" Dim SQLstr As String = "UPDATE " & tableName
SQLstr = SQLstr & " SET " & tableName & ".related_id='" & newRelatedId & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".id='" & Me.getID() & "'"
Return Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr)
